vsParam:
You think you can fool with such a lie?
You really underestimate me.

Uh? Was it Hazel's sound?
W, what's going on... Ah

How dare you say "I am okay" with such a pale face?
This is not funny at all.

B, but I have accumulated many works.
Let me do some more...

I'll deal with the remaining works!
You go to rest now, do you understand?

O, okay. I got it.
I am really sorry...

That's alright, go back to your room and rest.
I'll assign you works when you recover.

Oh... I didn't realize that Hazel
could be this gentle and kind!

Ah, you guys.
What did you mean?

Health is more important than those works.
I can't force them to work while they are unwell.

So, can I leave these works to you?
Please help us prepare these things.
Uh!? But, this should be the Student Union's work...

You can easily manage this, right?
I can tell that you are very energetic now, please!

Hmm... Never mind, we are just helping a sick student.
To make him rest assured, let's help with it!

Hazel!
These are the things you asked us to prepare!
Thank you. You are quicker than I thought.

Of course.
We worked hard for it!

Is it... You must be tired.
Have some desserts if you don't mind.

My uncle Silver Birch Sensei
just sent some desserts.

And they say desserts are good when one is tired.
B, but, I won't force you if you don't like...

Ho ho, you are like a child when eating.
You can finish them all if you like.

W, what do you mean by that? I just...
I'll give to someone else if you don't want.

Wait! We want them, we want!
I am going to start!

Hee hee, they are so delicious,
[px]!

Ah, and... thanks for your help, the Student Union's
work could be done on time. Thank you.

You are welcome!
I didn't expect Hazel to treat us.

You are quite gentle occasionally!
Smack, smack... Er~! This dessert is so good!

What do you mean by "occasionally"? That's rude.
I am always gentle, no?

If you say that... I have another favor to ask you
after you finish eating.
You have gobbled the desserts, right? Ho ho ho...

Uh huh, hmm!? I, I was just joking!
Sorry!!

Um... You guys act like that when I get a bit gentler.
So annoying.
